divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside the office at work to smoke. I lit a cigerette I looked up at the sky and saw a glowing wedge shape object about 500ft. above the tree line. I watched for a few minutes not sure what the object was doing. The wedge seemed to be lit from the inside, but had a metalic shimmer to it. After aprox. 6 minutes, the object made a clockwise turn, very slow, Northeast and slowly vanished into the darkness. A cold chill went through my body. I was very upset and went to seek medical attention.
Summary: It was a glowing wedge shaped object.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Flowery Branch
There were no other sightings in Flowery Branch on or around September 24th 2010
